name: Twisty Tumble (VR)
description:
Twist the pieces and rebuild the puzzle pyramids until all they all match! Every level is a new undersea challenge with a different shape and size: when the game starts, you get a quick look at the finished puzzle - then it gets scrambled as all the pieces tumble down. So many possibilities, but only one solution per level... Dive deep into dozens of tricky challenges!

Colorful and fun for all ages - go on coral reef adventure starting with small simple puzzles - then add to the challenge at your own pace. Varying difficulty options and randomized patterns give you an endless variety of new experiences. Test your wits and super puzzle sleuthing skills in a calm undersea environment comfortable for players of all kinds.
